title: gRPC panicked! runtime error: index out of range with length 0
body:
I got this with a07e604e

```
level=error msg="gRPC panicked!" error="runtime error: index out of range [28812] with length 0" stack="goroutine 12853 [running]:
runtime/debug.Stack(0xc0000e8690, 0x1815065, 0x5)

```

Are you also running eth2stats client?
Did this error occur while syncing?

In my case (I had the same issue ( #4990 ) which I closed to avoid double issue-recording):
eth2stats: **yes**
Did this error occur while syncing: **direct at startup of beacon** (see beacon.log in #4990)
